inclusion.criterion: Mother willing to participate voluntarily and able to provide signed informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Infant eligible for rotavirus vaccine immunization as per national policy (male or female infant, 6-12 weeks old)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Mother willing to undergo study procedures, including questionnaires, HIV counselling and testing, CD4 testing, and provide breast milk and blood sample at enrolment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plans to remain resident in the area and willing to come for scheduled visits for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous administration of rotavirus vaccine to child.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a documented positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record, indicating an active autoimmune disease. He is currently being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides.
